title: Clean Energy & Access Improvement Project - Part 2 - Transmission System Strengthening Grid Substation Part (TSSGSP) Lot A-3, Package A & Package B
decision_details:
? the proposal made by Hon. Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Minister of Power and Energy, to award the above contracts as follows, as recommended by the Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (CAPC), was approved by the Cabinet:

* Lot A-3, Package A - Part 2 - for a sum of US $2,124,976.39 Plus     LKR 44,163,915.00

* Lot A-3,  Package B - Part  2    - 	for a  sum of Euro 1,331,254.00 Plus  LKR 41,759,632.00
